attributes.last: '''Isaac Hempstead-Wright''' is an English actor. He stars in HBO's ''Game of Thrones'' as Bran Stark.He was confirmed in the role on 13 October 2009. AlthoughÂ ''Game of Thrones''Â was his first major television role, he also appeared in the 2011 Horror film'' http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Awakening_(2011_film) The AwakeningÂ ''in the role of Tom Hill, in the 2014 animated comedy filmÂ ''http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Boxtrolls The Boxtrolls'' as Eggs andÂ has appeared in a number of commercials.He was part of the initial starring cast and remains a member of the starring cast for the Season 2
